name: Pro Addons For Elementor
author: Wasim

sections.description:
Enhance your Elementor page-building experience with Pro Addons For Elementor. Add powers to your website builder using our easy-to-use theme builder, which can be used to make theme templates such as single, archive, search results, etc. Pro Addons For Elementor provides widgets such as dynamic text, dynamic image, post navigation, post info, Lottie animation, etc. that can be used to enhance your website.

Requirements

  • WordPress (Version 5.0 or higher)
  • Elementor

ℹ️ Pro Addons For Elementor Features

Theme Builder

Pro Addons For Elementor theme builder can be used to make the theme templates for the below categories.

  • Single Post Template
  • Taxonomy Template
  • 404 Template
  • Search Template

Widgets

  • Post Dynamic Text – This widget can be used to fetch dynamic content from the post or meta tags.
  • Post Dynamic Image – The dynamic Image widget can be used to fetch dynamic image from the featured image and post meta.
  • Post Navigation: The Post Navigation widget provides the navigation button for the single post to go to the next and previous posts.
  • Post Info/Meta: The Post Info widget can be used to show the meta information of the single post such as author, date, categories, comments count, etc.
  • Lottie: The Lottie animation widget can be used to add the animation from the JSON file to your website.

Additional Features

  • Custom CSS – This feature is available in the Elementor builder page setting and can be used to add page-wise custom CSS for the pages, posts, and templates.
  • Header Code – Header code feature can be used to add custom code in the tag of the plugin, this is also available in the Elementor builder page setting.
  • Footer Code – This can be used to add custom code in the page before the end of tag, this is also available in the Elementor builder page setting.
sections.installation:
Install the plugin from the WordPress admin page “Plugins > Install”

or

  1. Upload pro-addons-for-elementor directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where Elementor works.

How much performance does Pro Addons For Elementor need?

Actually none! We designed it with maximum page performance in mind. Our tests did show literally no change in page loading speed.

Is Pro Addons For Elementor compatible with Caching plugins?

Yes, absolutely! There is no dynamic logic in the PHP code like other plugins have.
sections.changelog:
1.4.0

  • Add Lottie animation widget
  • Add post meta option in the post info widget
  • ACF plugin custom fields support in the Dynamic image widget
  • Bug Fixes

1.3.0

  • Add Post Info/meta widget
  • Bug Fixes

1.2.0

  • Add Post Navigation widget
  • Rename dynamic text and dynamic image widget
  • Bug Fixes

1.1.0

  • Add Dynamic image widget
  • Fixes bugs on the dynamic text widget

1.0.0

  • Initial version of the plugin

short_description: Pro Addons For Elementor is an essential addon for Elementor that provides the Elementor Pro features and functionality for free.
